meanings.definition: To gain an advantage or benefit
meanings.sent1: She profited from studying hard for the test.
meanings.sent2: The team profited from having a good strategy in place.
meanings.sent3: The cat profited from finding a sunny spot for a nap.
meanings.sent4: His kindness profited him with many loyal friends.
meanings.sent5: The early riser profited from the peaceful morning atmosphere.

meanings.definition: To make a profit or financial gain
meanings.sent1: The company profited from their successful marketing campaign.
meanings.sent2: Investors hope to profit from the stock market.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel profited from finding a hidden stash of acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her wise investment profited her greatly in the long run.
meanings.sent5: The farmer profited from a bountiful harvest this year.
